data.title: Meet the cast of Christopher Nolan's Oppenheimer
data.meta_description: Oppenheimer, Christopher Nolan’s biopic about the making of the first ever nuclear bomb, is in cinemas now.
data.text:
Oppenheimer covers a huge amount of ground, jumping between time periods, which can make the characters and events difficult to track.

Luckily for you, RadioTimes.com has assembled a guide to the real people behind the first atomic bomb.

Here's everything you need to know about the Oppenheimer cast, including which actor is playing which character and where you might recognise them from.

More like this

Who's in the cast of Oppenheimer?

The full Oppenheimer cast list is as follows:

Cillian Murphy as J Robert Oppenheimer

Emily Bunt as Katherine "Kitty" Oppenheimer

Matt Damon as Leslie Groves

Robert Downey Jr as Lewis Strauss

Florence Pugh as Jean Tatlock

Josh Hartnett as Ernest Lawrence

Casey Affleck as Boris Pash

Rami Malek as David Hill

Kenneth Branagh as Niels Bohr

Dylan Arnold as Frank Oppenheimer

Gustaf Skarsgård as Hans Bethe

Tom Conti as Albert Einstein

Dane DeHaan as Kenneth Nichols

Alden Ehrenreich as a senate aide

David Krumholtz as Isidor Isaac Rabi

Jack Quaid as Richard Feynman

Josh Peck as Kenneth Bainbridge

Danny Defferari as Enrico Fermi

Jefferson Hall as Haakon Chevalier

Jason Clarke as Roger Robb

James D'Arcy as Patrick Blackett

Tony Goldwyn as Gordon Gray

Devon Bostick as Seth Neddermeyer

Matthew Modine as Vannevar Bush

Emma Dumont as Jackie Oppenheimer

Benny Safdie as Edward Teller

Gary Oldman as Harry S Truman

Olivia Thirlby as Lilli Hornig

Alex Wolff as Luis Walter Alvarez

Scott Grimes as Counsel

Josh Zuckerman as Giovanni Rossi Lomanitz

Matthias Schweighöfer as Werner Heisenberg

Christopher Denham as Klaus Fuchs

David Rysdahl as Donald Hornig

Guy Burnet as George Eltenton

Louise Lombard as Ruth Tolman

Harrison Gilbertson as Philip Morrison

Trond Fausa Aurvåg as George Kistiakowsky

Olli Haaskivi as Edward Condon

John Gowans as Ward Evans

Kurt Koehler as Thomas A Morgan

Macon Blair as Lloyd Garrison

Harry Groener as Gale W McGee

Jack Cutmore-Scott as Lyall Johnson

James Remar as Henry Stimson

Gregory Jbara as Warren Magnuson

Tim DeKay as John Pastore

James Urbaniak as Kurt Gödel

Read on for everything you need to know about the major players, see below.

Cillian Murphy plays J Robert Oppenheimer

Who is J. Robert Oppenheimer? A theoretical physicist who was the "father of the atomic bomb" during the Second World War.

Talking about what Oppenheimer has in common with his Peaky Blinders character Shelby, Murphy recently told Radio Times Magazine: "I love the naughty, strange, weird, unpredictable areas of psychology that you get into where it doesn’t seem straightforward. They’re the best characters."

What else has Cillian Murphy been in? Murphy is best known for his role as Tommy Shelby in Peaky Blinders. The Irish actor has also starred in movies including 28 Days Later, Cold Mountain, Red Eye, and Breakfast on Pluto, as well as The Edge of Love, and the Christopher Nolan films Batman Begins, The Dark Knight, Inception, The Dark Knight Rises, and Dunkirk.

Matt Damon plays Leslie Groves

Who is Leslie Groves? A lieutenant general in the United States Army who played a crucial part in the Manhattan Project alongside Oppenheimer.

Damon previously revealed a fascinating anecdote, sharing that he had planned to take a break from acting, but the opportunity to work with Nolan instantly changed his course.

“This is going to sound made up, but it’s actually true," Damon confessed to Entertainment Weekly. "I had — not to get too personal — negotiated extensively with my wife that I was taking time off.

"I had been in Interstellar, and then Chris put me on ice for a couple of movies, so I wasn’t in the rotation, but I actually negotiated in couples therapy ­- this is a true story - the one caveat to my taking time off was if Chris Nolan called. This is without knowing whether or not he was working on anything because he never tells you. He just calls you out of the blue. And so, it was a moment in my household."

What else has Matt Damon been in? You might recognise Damon from the Bourne franchise. He has also tried his hand at other real-life roles including as Carroll Shelby in Ford v Ferrari and as James Granger in The Monuments Men in 2014. Damon previously worked with director Christopher Nolan on the film Interstellar.

Florence Pugh plays Jean Tatlock

Who is Jean Tatlock? A member of the United States Communist Party, and a psychiatrist, who was engaged in a romantic relationship with Robert Oppenheimer both before and during his marriage to Kitty.

What else has Florence Pugh been in? Pugh has also starred in Little Women, Hawkeye, Fighting with my Family, Midsommar, Don't Worry Darling and The Wonder. More recently, she voiced the character of Goldilocks in the latest Puss in Boots sequel.

Emily Bunt plays Katherine 'Kitty' Oppenheimer

Who is Kitty Oppenheimer? J Robert Oppenheimer’s wife and the mother of his children, Kitty has her own troubles and her own past that could hinder her husband's career.

What else has Emily Blunt been in? The Golden Globe-winning actress is best known for appearing in The Devil Wears Prada, Looper, The Young Victoria, Salmon Fishing in the Yemen, Into the Woods, Edge of Tomorrow and Mary Poppins Returns. More recently, she appeared in A Quiet Place and its sequel, Jungle Cruise, BBC drama The English and The Girl on the Train, for which she received a BAFTA nomination.

Robert Downey Jr plays Lewis Strauss

Who is Lewis Strauss? Lewis Strauss, a naval officer who served two terms on the United States Atomic Energy Commission, and who works with Oppenheimer - but whose side is he really on?

What else has Robert Downey Jr been in? Downey is best known for starring as Tony Stark in 10 films within the Marvel Cinematic Universe, beginning with Iron Man in 2008. In addition, Downey Jr has starred as Sherlock Holmes in Guy Ritchie’s film of the same name and its sequel. He has also appeared in Chaplin, Ally McBeal, and Tropic Thunder.

Josh Hartnett plays Ernest Lawrence

Who is Ernest Lawrence? An American nuclear physicist. In 1939, he bagged the Nobel Prize for his invention of the cyclotron. He was also instrumental in Oppenheimer's development of the atomic bomb during the Second World War.

What else has Josh Hartnett been in? Hartnett rose to fame in 1998 with a starring role in the Halloween franchise entry Halloween H20: 20 Years Later opposite Jamie Lee Curtis. His other film credits include The Faculty, Pearl Harbor and Black Hawk Down.

Casey Affleck plays Boris Pash

Who is Boris Pash? A United States Army military intelligence officer of Russian descent, Pash fought against the Bolsheviks in the Russian Civil War and remained staunchly dedicated to rooting out Russian espionage - including within the Manhattan Project.

What else has Casey Affleck been in? Affleck is best known for his Oscar-winning turn in Manchester by the Sea, along with the films To Die For, Good Will Hunting, Gerry, Steven Soderbergh's Ocean's film series, and A Ghost Story. Affleck previously worked with director Christopher Nolan on the film Interstellar.

Rami Malek plays David Hill

Who is David Hill? A member of the scientific community who is not pleased with the use of atomic weaponry.

What else has Rami Malek been in? Malek is best known for his Oscar-winning turn as Freddie Mercury in the film Bohemian Rhapsody, but has also appeared in the series Mister Robot and films including No Time To Die.

Sir Kenneth Branagh plays Niels Bohr

Who is Niels Bohr? A Danish physicist who was pivotal to modern understandings of atomic structure and quantum theory, developing the Bohr model of the atom. Bohr was a mentor of Werner Heisenberg, the German theoretical physicist who worked on the German atomic weapons programme in the Second World War.

What else has Sir Kenneth Branagh been in? Branagh is an iconic actor and director of stage and screen, known for his prolific work in Shakespeare productions and adaptations, his role in the Harry Potter franchise as Gilderoy Lockheart, and as Hercule Poirot in recent film adaptations of Agatha Christie novels. Branagh previously worked with director Christopher Nolan on the films Dunkirk and Tenet.

Benny Safdie plays Edward Teller

Who is Edward Teller? An Hungarian-American scientist who worked with Oppenheimer on the Manhattan Project and is known colloquially as the "father of the hydrogen bomb".

What else has Benny Safdie been in? Fans might recognise Safdie from his appearance in the 2017 film Good Time, Licorice Pizza and, most recently, Obi-Wan Kenobi.

Dylan Arnold plays Frank Oppenheimer

Who is Frank Oppenheimer? Oppenheimer’s younger brother. Frank was a professor of physics at the University of Colorado and was noted for his ties to the Communist Party.

What else has Dylan Arnold been in? You might recognise the actor from his role as Cameron in the 2018 Halloween reboot and its sequel Halloween Kills. He also had a recurring role in the final series of Nashville. More recently, he appeared in You season 3 as college student Dylan Arnold.

Gustaf Skarsgård plays Hans Bethe

Who is Hans Bethe? A German-American theoretical physicist and Nobel Prize winner who helped develop the first nuclear weapons for the US. Bethe later opposed the use of such weapons.

What else has Gustaf Skarsgård been in? The son of Stellan Skarsgård and brother of Alexander and Bill Skarsgård, Gustaf is known for his roles in the films Evil, The Way Back, and Kon-Tiki, along with series such as Westworld, Merlin, Cursed, and Vikings.

Matthew Modine plays Vannevar Bush

Who is Vannevar Bush? An electrical engineer who headed up the Office of Scientific Research and Development.

What else has Matthew Modine been in? Modine rose to fame thanks to his role as Marine Private/Sergeant JT Davis in Stanley Kubrick's Full Metal Jacket. He went on to star in films including Birdy, Married to the Mob, and Short Cuts. Modine also played the role of sinister scientist Dr Martin Brenner in Stranger Things.

Dane DeHaan plays Kenneth Nichols

Who is Kenneth Nichols? An American army officer and a civil engineer of the Manhattan Project who became an enemy of Oppenheimer.

What else has Dane DeHaan been in? DeHaan is best known for his leading role in Chronicle, the films Kill Your Darling and Life, and as the Green Goblin in The Amazing Spider-Man 2.

Jason Clarke plays Roger Robb

Who is Roger Robb? Robb served as special counsel to an Atomic Energy Commission hearing looking into the security clearance of J Robert Oppenheimer in 1954.

What else has Jason Clarke been in? Clarke has been a prolific Hollywood regular in recent years, featuring in films including Zero Dark Thirty, White House Down, Dawn of the Planet of the Apes, Terminator Genisys, Everest, All I See is You, Mudbound, Chappaquiddick, First Man, and Pet Sematary.

Emma Dumont plays Jackie Oppenheimer

Who is Jackie Oppenheimer? Oppenheimer’s sister-in-law and wife to his younger brother Frank. Jackie once had ties to the Communist Party.

What else has Emma Dumont been in? Dumont is best known for her role as Melanie Segal in the ABC Family series Bunheads. She also appeared as Emma Karn in the NBC series Aquarius and as Lorna Dane/Polaris in the FOX series The Gifted.

Tom Conti plays Albert Einstein

Who is Albert Einstein? A German-born theoretical physicist, widely considered one of the most influential scientists of all time. Einstein is best known for his work on the theory of relativity.

What else has Tom Conti been in? An acclaimed performer of stage and screen, Conti is best known for his Oscar-nominated turn in Reuben, Reuben.

Alden Ehrenreich as a Senate aide to Lewis Strauss

Who is the Senate aide? Someone who works alongside Lewis Strauss during his confirmation hearing and who questions his choices.

What else has Alden Ehrenreich been in? Ehrenreich is best known for his roles in Beautiful Creatures, Blue Jasmine, Stoker, Hail, Caesar!, and as Han Solo in Solo: A Star Wars Story.

David Dastmalchian plays William L Borden

Who is William L Borden? Borden was the executive director of the United States Congress Joint Committee on Atomic Energy from 1949 to 1953 and accused J Robert Oppenheimer of being an agent for the Soviet Union.

What else has David Dastmalchian been in? Dastmalchian has starred in the Ant-Man trilogy, the television series The Flash, and The Suicide Squad, and worked with director Denis Villeneuve on the films Prisoners, Blade Runner 2049, and Dune: Part One.

Jefferson Hall plays Haakon Chevalier

Who is Haakkon Chevalier? A writer best known for his ties to the Communist Party and whose connection to J Robert Oppenheimer would impact the latter's career.

Who is Jefferson Hall? Hall is best known for his dual role as the twins Jason Lannister and Tyland Lannister in House of the Dragon.

Gary Oldman plays President Harry S Truman

Who is President Truman? The 33rd President of the United States of America and a member of the Democrat Party, Truman made the decision to use the atomic bomb against Japan towards the end of the Second World War.

What else has Gary Oldman been in? An Oscar-winning actor for his role in Darkest Hour, Gary Oldman has been a Hollywood mainstay for decades, having roles in films such as The Firm, Bram Stoker's Dracula, JFK, True Romance, Air Force One, The Contender, Leon: The Professional, the Harry Potter franchise, and Christopher Nolan's Dark Knight trilogy.
